    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le cycle d'azote</string>
            <string language="en">The nitrogen cycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Stickstoffkreislauf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ciclo de nitrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ciclo di azoto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος αζώτου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciclo de nitrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce schéma fonctionnel montre un processus inachevé du cycle de l'azote. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un  exercice en remplissant les cases correctes avec les noms des  bactéries responsables du processus de conversion.</string>
            <string language="en">This block diagram shows an incomplete process of the nitrogen cycle. This can be used in an exercise by filling up the correct boxes with the names of the bacteria responsible for the conversion process.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">air</string>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bactéries</string>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rotation de collecte</string>
            <string language="en">crop rotation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bactéries de  dénitrification</string>
            <string language="en">denitrifying bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">légumineuses</string>
            <string language="en">legumes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">plantes légumineuses</string>
            <string language="en">leguminous plants</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nitrates</string>
            <string language="en">nitrates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nitrifiant des bactéries</string>
            <string language="en">nitrifying bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">azote</string>
            <string language="en">nitrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cycle de l'azote</string>
            <string language="en">nitrogen cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sol</string>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Blockdiagramm zeigt einen unvollständigen
Prozeß des Stickstoffkreislaufs. Dieses kann in einer Übung 
verwendet werden, indem man herauf die korrekten Kästen mit den Namen
des Bakteriums füllt, das für den Konvertierung Prozeß 
verantwortlich ist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de bloco mostra um processo 
incompleto do ciclo de nitrogênio. Isto pode ser usado em um 
exercício enchendo acima das caixas corretas com os nomes das 
bactérias responsáveis para o processo da conversão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema a blocchi mostra un processo 
incompleto del ciclo di azoto. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione riempiendosi sulle caselle corrette di nomi dei 
batteri responsabili del processo di conversione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ομάδων δεδομένων εμφανίζει ελλιπή 
διαδικασία του κύκλου αζώτου. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση με να γεμίσει επάνω τα σωστά πεδία 
με τα ονόματα των βακτηριδίων αρμόδιων για τη διαδικασία 
μετατροπής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama de bloque muestra un proceso 
incompleto del ciclo de nitrógeno. Esto se puede utilizar en un
ejercicio llenando encima de los rectángulos correctos de los nombres
de las bacterias responsables del proceso de la conversión.</string>
          </description>
